Text:
That's right. No subs. Do you own the original DVD? In that case, ¿could you rip the subpack with vobsub and share it? It should be no more than 10 Mb compressed.
Thanks. Awesome movie :)
Correction! The subs are there. There must be some problem with the colour palette. I'll try to fix it with scenarist. Thanks a lot. ;)

detta går ju långsamt   vad har du för lina ???? :/

Found or not found the sub?
får jag någonsin hem denna filmen skall jag seeda så ögonen blöder.. den är underbar.
Compression? How did you rip it?  I suspect a movie this long is heavily compressed?
Just for the record: According to www.widescreen.org and IMDB "Mad, Mad World" was filmed in Ultra PanaVision 70 with an aspect ratio of 2,76 : 1 (!) on the 70 mm prints.
